title: News Topics Character Limit
body: To edit the character limit on your homepage topics, edit [this](https://github.com/NamelessMC/Nameless/blob/29cdc457e2a6ef4c13baba81f76abe63d0f06647/core/classes/Core/Util.php#L425) line in `core/classes/Core/Util.php` and change the `750` value to the value you wish.
